summary: Diff adds a TanStack React Router-based multi-page marketing frontend skeleton with shared layout (Navbar/Footer), reusable blocks (CTA, FAQ, comparison table, age selector), and a contact/demo form with basic validation + success state. However, evidence is insufficient for several specified visuals/assets and some required iconography; there are also a couple of unrequested additions (backend stub and external promotional footer link).

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include required static visual assets as local static files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in relevant sections (Hero, Our Method diagrams, iconography).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows components that reference generated assets (e.g., thinline icon sprite), but does not show any added image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (and omitted files are not verifiable from the provided summary). Also only some required icon names appear supported in code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Thin-line icon set must include (focus, memory, speed, creativity, assess, train, strengthen, apply) in a consistent style and be rendered as needed.
missing_requirements.reason: ThinlineIcon component only supports four names ('focus' | 'memory' | 'speed' | 'creativity'); the additional required icons are not implemented in the shown code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact / Book Demo page includes a “Map-like” visual block.
missing_requirements.reason: While the form and alternate contact options are implemented, no map-like visual block is shown in the provided diff excerpts; the Contact page implementation itself is not included in the visible file list.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend Motoko canister stub (actor {}).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states backend feature development is a non-goal for this marketing site build; adding backend code was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes an external promotional link to caffeine.ai with UTM parameters and a 'Built with' attribution.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and constitutes an external link/promo not part of the specified marketing requirements.
